name: The Last Knight (TheBuffED)
description:
I made this game as a personal challenge in 2 hours in Godot.

Click on valid tiles to move your knight across the board to try and capture the king. Watch out for the insane amount of queens, they will take you if they can! Use the advantage of having two moves before the queens move, but be careful of the timer at the bottom. If it hits zero, game over.
